00037 #include <errno.h>
00038 #include <fcntl.h>
00039 #include <glob.h>
00040 #include <limits.h>
00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <stdlib.h>
00043 #include <string.h>
00044 #include <sys/types.h>
00045 #include <sys/time.h>
00046 #include <unistd.h>
00047 
00048 #include <libcfs/util/param.h>
00049 
00050 double
00051 timenow ()
00052 {
00053    struct timeval tv;
00054 
00055    gettimeofday (&tv, NULL);
00056    return (tv.tv_sec + tv.tv_usec / 1000000.0);
00057 }
00058 
00059 typedef struct {
00060         unsigned long        msgs_alloc;
00061         unsigned long        msgs_max;
00062         unsigned long        errors;
00063         unsigned long        send_count;
00064         unsigned long        recv_count;
00065         unsigned long        route_count;
00066         unsigned long        drop_count;
00067         unsigned long long   send_length;
00068         unsigned long long   recv_length;
00069         unsigned long long   route_length;
00070         unsigned long long   drop_length;
00071 } counters_t;
00072 
00073 unsigned long long subull(unsigned long long a, unsigned long long b)
00074 {
00075         if (a < b)
00076                 return -1ULL - b + a + 1;
00077 
00078         return a - b;
00079 }
00080 
00081 unsigned long long subul(unsigned long a, unsigned long b)
00082 {
00083         if (a < b)
00084                 return -1UL - b + a + 1;
00085 
00086         return a - b;
00087 }
00088 
00089 double rul(unsigned long a, double secs)
00090 {
00091         return (double)a/secs;
00092 }
00093 
00094 double rull(unsigned long long a, double secs)
00095 {
00096         return (double)a/secs;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void
00100 do_stat (int fd)
00101 {
00102    static char  buffer[1024];
00103    static double last = 0.0;
00104    static counters_t old_counter;
00105    double now;
00106    double t;
00107    counters_t new_counter;
00108    counters_t counter;
00109    int    n;
00110 
00111    lseek (fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00112    now = timenow();
00113    n = read(fd, buffer, sizeof(buffer) - 1);
00114    if (n < 0)
00115    {
00116       fprintf (stderr, "Can't read statfile\n");
00117       exit (1);
00118    }
00119    buffer[n] = 0;
00120 
00121    n = sscanf(buffer, "%lu %lu %lu %lu %lu %lu %lu %llu %llu %llu %llu",
00122                &new_counter.msgs_alloc, &new_counter.msgs_max,
00123                &new_counter.errors, 
00124                &new_counter.send_count, &new_counter.recv_count,
00125                &new_counter.route_count, &new_counter.drop_count,
00126                &new_counter.send_length, &new_counter.recv_length,
00127                &new_counter.route_length, &new_counter.drop_length);
00128    if (n < 11)
00129    {
00130       fprintf (stderr, "Can't parse statfile\n");
00131       exit (1);
00132    }
00133 
00134    if (last == 0.0) {
00135                 printf("M %lu(%lu) E %lu S %llu/%lu R %llu/%lu F %llu/%lu "
00136                        "D %llu/%lu\n",
00137                    new_counter.msgs_alloc, new_counter.msgs_max,
00138                    new_counter.errors,
00139                    new_counter.send_length, new_counter.send_count,
00140                    new_counter.recv_length, new_counter.recv_count,
00141                    new_counter.route_length, new_counter.route_count,
00142                    new_counter.drop_length, new_counter.drop_count);
00143    } else {
00144            t = now - last;
00145 
00146            counter.msgs_alloc = new_counter.msgs_alloc;
00147            counter.msgs_max = new_counter.msgs_max;
00148 
00149            counter.errors = subul(new_counter.errors, old_counter.errors);
00150            counter.send_count = subul(new_counter.send_count, old_counter.send_count);
00151            counter.recv_count = subul(new_counter.recv_count, old_counter.recv_count);
00152            counter.route_count = subul(new_counter.route_count, old_counter.route_count);
00153            counter.drop_count = subul(new_counter.drop_count, old_counter.drop_count);
00154            counter.send_length = subull(new_counter.send_length, old_counter.send_length);
00155            counter.recv_length = subull(new_counter.recv_length, old_counter.recv_length);
00156            counter.route_length = subull(new_counter.route_length, old_counter.route_length);
00157            counter.drop_length = subull(new_counter.drop_length, old_counter.drop_length);
00158 
00159            printf ("M %3lu(%3lu) E %0.0f S %7.2f/%6.0f R %7.2f/%6.0f F %7.2f/%6.0f D %4.2f/%0.0f\n",
00160                    counter.msgs_alloc, counter.msgs_max,
00161                    rul(counter.errors,t),
00162                    rull(counter.send_length,t*1024.0*1024.0), rul(counter.send_count, t),
00163                    rull(counter.recv_length,t*1024.0*1024.0), rul(counter.recv_count, t),
00164                    rull(counter.route_length,t*1024.0*1024.0), rul(counter.route_count, t),
00165                    rull(counter.drop_length,t*1024.0*1024.0), rul(counter.drop_count, t));
00166    }
00167 
00168    old_counter = new_counter;
00169    fflush (stdout);
00170 
00171    lseek (fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00172    last = timenow();
00173 }
00174 
00175 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00176 {
00177         int interval = 0;
00178         glob_t path;
00179         int fd;
00180 
00181         if (argc > 1)
00182                 interval = atoi(argv[1]);
00183 
00184         if (cfs_get_param_paths(&path, "stats") != 0) {
00185                 fprintf(stderr, "LNet stats not available\n");
00186                 return 1;
00187         }
00188 
00189         fd = open(path.gl_pathv[0], O_RDONLY);
00190         if (fd < 0) {
00191                 fprintf(stderr, "failed to open '%s': %s\n", path.gl_pathv[0],
00192                         strerror(errno));
00193                 cfs_free_param_data(&path);
00194                 return 1;
00195         }
00196         cfs_free_param_data(&path);
00197 
00198         do_stat(fd);
00199         if (interval == 0)
00200                 return 0;
00201 
00202         while (1) {
00203                 sleep(interval);
00204                 do_stat(fd);
00205         }
00206         /* Never reached */
00207 }
